snippet: SCOTT--Brother Gilbert J.,S.J., on January 6, 2016. Reposing at the Murray-Weigel Hall Chapel, 515 East Fordham Rd., Bronx, NY, on Friday, 3-5pm and 7-9pm (prayer service at 7pm). Funeral Mass at the Murray Weigel Hall Chapel, Saturday, 11:30am. Interment at the Jesuit Cemetery, Auriesville, NY. In lieu of flowers, donations may be made to Northeast Province of the Society of Jesus, 39 E. 83rd St, NYC, NY 10028. For information, contact Farenga Bros, Inc., Directors (718)654-0500. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCOTT, BROTHER GILBERT J.
